user_profile.name: Omar Al-Mansoor
user_profile.description: Omar is a 40-year-old athletic man from a Middle Eastern background who has advanced tech experience and a friendly personality. With a cautious decision-making style, he is currently focused on arranging home modifications for an elderly family member to ensure their comfort and safety, driven by a desire to support loved ones while navigating the task with simplicity and adaptability.

instructions.dialogue: Share some key information but keep some details private.
instructions.profile: Share most of your profile information when asked.
instructions.hidden_state: Express clear emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: Local medical supply stores and online retailers
additional_requirements: Items should be easy to install
